reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just back from 2 weeks in Anaxos have to say we reckon it’s one of the best holidays we've had.
reviews.title: Terrific holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel as excellent, Paul, Tony Frank and Michael deserve much praise for the effort they put in to making our stay a pleasure.
reviews.title: Anaxos, 5 Star Plaza Palace

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: A couple of weeks ago I stayed at the Anaxos Hotel in Lesvos. Anaxos itself is very quiet, this meant you could always get a sunbed. The beach wasn't particularly clean – full of cigarette butts and general rubbish - it was probably one of the dirtiest beaches on a Greek island that I have been to. It was also very windy while we were there which made the water choppy and unclear.
reviews.title: Relaxing holiday but wouldn't go back

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: There are plenty of restaurants in Anaxos. We never had a bad meal but most of the places lacked atmosphere, as there was hardly ever any Greek music playing and they were always quite empty. Our favourite restaurant was The Tropicana, as the staff were very friendly.
reviews.title: Wonderful Holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We found the hotel to be fairly clean but there was quite a bit of lime-scale in the bottom of our shower – just a bit off-putting. Our room was nice and large but we were on the road side and we experienced a lot of noise from the motorbikes going by.
reviews.title: Fantastic holiday and fantastic family running it !!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Before we went away we looked at the reviews of The Anaxos Hotel and many people had commented on how friendly the staff were. At first we did agree with this but as the week went on they seemed less friendly towards us. We feel that this was because we didn't eat in their restaurant at all and only drank in the bar a few times (this was due to it being indoors – we prefer to eat and drink outside when we are on holiday).
reviews.title: loking forward to our 16th year at anaxos hotel that says it all

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: About half way through the week we hung our towels on the balcony to dry. While we were out it became quite windy and we came back to discover that two of our towels were missing.. We went to speak to a member of staff and he seemed a bit annoyed at us and reluctant to replace them – they must have had this problem before!
reviews.title: excellent hotel, friendly family fun, delicious food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was a very last minute booking for us and we had never been to Lesvos before. The hotel is lovely - our room was large and very clean - and the pool was immaculate. As it was still early in the season, not much was open when we arrived, but several more tavernas had opened by the end of our stay. We ate at the hotel every night - the food, freshly prepared by Tony,Paul and Effie was always excellent, (the greek dishes are especially good) and very reasonably priced, as was the house wine. Tony and Frank were great hosts, always ready with suggestions for our days out with in our hire car. We would recommend Costas and Alison (Costas Rentals) on the main road - very helpful and much cheaper than 'Billys'. If you read this boys - thanks for a really great week!!!!
reviews.title: Lovely, relaxing week - great people!
Good Hotel, family run, friendly and comfortable. Shame the resort had not really opened for business as we were the first grou
reviews.text: Great Hotel, clean and very welcoming. Because we were the first visitors of the season many of the other tourism businesses in the resort were not yet open but busy preparing to open on May 5th. Thankfully the Hotel had everything you need, a bar, restaurant, wifi (best in the bar and reception area)' swimming pool and plenty of places to sit around.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The food was good, especially the Sea Bream.
reviews.title: Excellent Holiday...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: We were with a lively crowd, which was good fun but may have been a little noisy for those in rooms above the bar late into the night.
reviews.title: Another Fabulous Holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was cleaned and our beds made for us everyday except on the Sunday. The room was comfortable and large with a small terrace overlooking the pool and the sea beyond.
reviews.title: We enjoyed our stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had an excellent stay at this hotel. Room was very spacious and clean with good sized balcony, though self catering facilities are limited. The family who own the hotel could not have been more friendly or helpful, and certainly made the whole holiday very enjoyable The food in the restaurant was excellent and reasonably priced, and the bar area was very comfortable and friendly. The first week we had very good weather, but unfortunately the weather changed in the second week and was very cloudy and cooler, but of course was the end of the season. All in all we enjoyed our holiday and would certainly recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Very good Holiday, would certainly recommend the Anaxos Hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very nice hotel, If you go to this hotel you will be well looked after. I can see why so many people revisit the Anaxos Hotel.
reviews.title: Great Holiday - Lovely Hotel with great staff looking after you!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff are very friendly and can not do enough for you. Good Food, nice Rooms.
reviews.title: Another wonderful holiday in Anaxos Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: There is a bus stop at the top of the road which can take you into a few different villages with nice souvenir shops, castle and churches etc with vey beautiful views across the sea and some lovely places to eat.
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would recommend this hotel to those looking to stay in Anaxos, as I can not find a bad word to say about it.
reviews.title: room with a view (if only)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room had a good view, was quiet, and suprisingly large, with the added bonus of having a balcony in the sun all afternoon.
reviews.title: loved it...yammas

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: Our room was cleaned every day, apart from Sunday, and the hotel always looked clean.
reviews.title: All our expectations were met .... and bettered.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: This was our ninth visit to the hotel and we are going to book soon for next year. We are always made to feel so welcome, everywhere is very clean and tidy. Paul, Effie, Tony and Frank work very hard to make sure each guest is welcome. The food here is the best in Anaxos and the service is very good too (well done Frank) Paul and Tony are in the kitchen producing some really great meals. Thanks very much to Effie for talking me for a walk around the resort and giving me lots of info regarding the village. The resort itself does seem a lot quieter than previous years, possible because First Choice no longer go there as they now All inclusive only . Such a shame as this is a really beautiful island and it really should be on everyone's "places to visit" list. We will definately be back next year - see you there!
reviews.title: Another great holiday at the Anaxos Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: just back from our 20th year at anaxos hotel ,and already bean to travel agents for next year ,paul ,effie tony and frank are just the same cant do enough for anyone ,food is still great ,had an great night on tonys birthday 6th september we are always there for that he makes an amazing punch ,still take our grandson he is 21 ,he has a great time we keep trying to go without him havent managed it yet ,looking forward to 2013 already .
reviews.title: sally 190734

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: have stayed here three times, and every time has been amazing. Tony, Frank, Effie, and Paul go out of their way to make you feel welcome, and like one of the family. The rooms are spotlessly clean. The pool never seems to be too busy, as it is so close to the beach, so most people tend to go there. The food is of a very high standard, and is no more expensive than any of the local restaurants, and if there is something in particular you want, they can usually accommodate that. Didn't go this year, but hoping to go back soon. Would recommend to anybody.
reviews.title: great, great, great!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012
reviews.text: I came last year and loved it came again this year and it was still at same high standard! The owners of the hotel are the most friendliest people always making u feel welcome and will go out of their way to help u with everything! The food is AMAZING, I would recommend this hotel to everyone! I've never been disappointed, the quality of service provided is of the above and beyond the highest quality, its good place for people of all ages to come and visit! Tony, frank, paul and effie really show holiday makers how to feel at home and are the nicest people the hotel is perfect its actually like paradise coming here! Its got great entertainment perfect pool 2 minutes from the beach, I loved being made to feel so welcome! Fantastic location fantastic hotel and fantastic people! Thank you! Kerry and Murat
reviews.title: Hotel Anaxos greatest hotel in Lesvos!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I stayed here with a few friends for a week over the Jubilee weekend. It was much quieter than expected which we were told was unusual for the time of year but we thoroughly enjoyed having the pool mostly to ourselves. The sun-loungers were comfy and the pool side was in the sun all day, although there were some spots in the shade too if you'd prefer.
reviews.title: Great hotel, great food, great holiday!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We visited Lesbos in early September 2008 with First Choice Holidays staying at the Anoxos Hotel in Anaxos.
reviews.title: Relaxing Resort

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled with family
reviews.text: The terminal building at Mitilini airport is very small and luggage reclaim is very crowded with just one flight, so if two arrived together then it would be a real crush!
reviews.title: What a fantastic chilled out holiday

likes.disliked: — The bar was not always open late on a night

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled with friends
reviews.text: The resort transfer coaches are stacked up just outside the terminal building so there is not far to carry the cases. Allocation of the correct coach for our resort was done very efficiently by the First Choice reps although we were quite surprised to have the luggage labels on our cases marked with a large number! More explanation of this later.
reviews.title: Just like your best mates!!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had been a little apprehensive about the two and a half hours quoted for the transfer from the airport to Anaxos. As it turned out the trip each way took around one and a half hours. The coach was comfortable and air conditioned and the trip quite interesting passing through the bustling capital Mitilini then across the flat central region of the island passing the salt flats (See the flamingos!) and then over the northern mountains eventually descending in to the northern plain.
reviews.title: clean and quiet
Excellent stay
reviews.text: The coach stopped a couple of miles from the resort and all the luggage was unloaded on to a pickup truck. The reason being is that the coach can not get down the narrow roads in to the resort, hence the numbers on our suitcase labels.
